Publishing of your book can take up to two days.

Often times, We are put through tests.Tests that determine our faith and values. Well this isn\'t too far from a certain young woman called Jane. Jane and her fiancee Dylan were hitting the road when a truck hit them, hard. Some might have said that the events that followed after were perhaps just a figment of her imagination, if she decided to share her story. Having her faith tested proved to be rather difficult task in a world where it felt like she would vanish a moment later.
